definition: to receive hospital treatment/to be hospitalized
to live/to dwell/to stay/to reside/to stop/(suffix indicating firmness, steadiness, or coming to a halt)
to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research

sentences.english: Thursday, Lexi was hospitalized after complaining that her feet hurt.
sentences.chinese: 周四，Lexi在称脚疼后接受住院治疗。

sentences.english: Neither my wife nor I had ever needed long-term hospitalization—not yet.
sentences.chinese: 我的妻子和我从来都没有长期住院治疗的经历。

sentences.english: Between 1% to 10% of patients with clinical illness require hospitalization.
sentences.chinese: 呈临床病症的1%至10%的病人需要住院治疗。

sentences.english: He is hospitalized in stable condition.
sentences.chinese: 患者是一名8岁男孩，他正在住院治疗，病情稳定。

sentences.english: What is the goal for my time in inpatient therapy?
sentences.chinese: 我在住院治疗这段时间里的目标是什么？

sentences.english: Methods A retrospective study was performed on 64 patients with bullous epidermo-necrolysis type of drug eruption.
sentences.chinese: 方法回顾研究了64例住院治疗的该型药疹患者。

sentences.english: She is now in hospital in serious but stable condition.
sentences.chinese: 她目前正住院治疗，虽然病情严重，但状况已经稳定。

sentences.english: Questionnaire-based patient treatment satisfaction was also measured.
sentences.chinese: 问卷以测量住院治疗满意度为基础。

sentences.english: The primary composite endpoint was all-cause mortality or hospitalization for HF.
sentences.chinese: 主要复合终点是所有原因的死亡率或住院治疗的心衰。

sentences.english: Jack fell off his bicycle and got hurt.
sentences.chinese: 杰克骑车摔伤，得住院治疗。

sentences.english: Hospitalization, for both physical and psychological diseases, is also free of charge.
sentences.chinese: 身心两方面疾病的住院治疗也都是免费的。

sentences.english: She should be hospitalized for a period of time.
sentences.chinese: 她得住院治疗一个时期。

sentences.english: Some even require hospitalization or wind up with kidney failure.
sentences.chinese: 有些甚至需要住院治疗或者出现肾衰竭病症。

sentences.english: VA patients are sent to community hospitals for inpatient care.
sentences.chinese: 军转医院患者在社区医院里接受住院治疗。

sentences.english: The doctor insisted that the girl should be hospitalized .
sentences.chinese: 大夫坚持认为那个女孩要住院治疗。

sentences.english: After the event, Ditan hospitals require hospitalization Ming month.
sentences.chinese: 事情发生后，地坛医院要求张明住院治疗一个月。

definition: to be in hospital/to be hospitalized
to transfer (a patient) to a different hospital/to transfer to hospital (e.g. a prisoner)
to leave hospital/to be discharged from hospital
to make a definite diagnosis/confirmed (case of a specific disease)
to see a doctor/to seek medical advice
to provide critical care (to a patient or a diseased plant)
